lyrics.text: Lesson 89. A Slip of the Tongue.
First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Who made the only funny joke that evening and why?
lyrics.translation: 那天晚上谁讲了唯一一个有趣的笑话，为什么？

lyrics.text: People will do anything to see a free show, even if it is a bad one.
lyrics.translation: 人们会为了看一场免费的演出做任何事情，即使是一场糟糕的演出。

lyrics.text: When the news got round that a comedy show would be presented at our local cinema by the P&U Birdseed Company,
lyrics.translation: 当消息传开，P&U鸟食公司将在我们当地的电影院上演一场喜剧表演时，

lyrics.text: we all rushed to see it.
We had to queue for hours to get in and there must have been several hundred people present just before the show began.
lyrics.translation: 我们必须排了好几个小时的队才能进去，而且就在演出开始前，肯定有好几百人在那里。

lyrics.text: Unfortunately, the show was one of the dullest we have ever seen.
lyrics.translation: 不幸的是，这个表演是我们看过的最无聊的表演之一。

lyrics.text: Those who failed to get in need not have felt disappointed, as many of the artists who should have appeared did not come.
lyrics.translation: 那些没能进来的人不必感到失望，因为许多本应该出现的艺术家并没有来。

lyrics.text: The only funny things we heard that evening came from the advertiser at the beginning of the program.
lyrics.translation: 那天晚上我们听到的唯一有趣的事情来自节目开始时的广告商。

lyrics.text: He was obviously very nervous and for some minutes stood awkwardly before the microphone.
lyrics.translation: 他显然非常紧张，尴尬地站在麦克风前几分钟。

lyrics.text: As soon as he opened his mouth, everyone burst out laughing.
lyrics.translation: 他一开口，大家就哄堂大笑。

lyrics.text: We all know what the poor man should have said, but what he actually said was,
lyrics.translation: 我们都知道那个穷人本应该说些什么，但实际上他说的却是，

lyrics.text: This is the Poo and E-Seed Bird Company.

lyrics.translation: 女士们晚上好，先生们晚上好。
